a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Industrial water as a share of total water withdrawals, 1980 to 2020
Industrial water withdrawals as a percentage of total water withdrawals (which is the sum of water used for
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
Note: The industrial water sector refers to self-supplied industries not connected to the public distribution network. The ratio between net
consumption and withdrawal is estimated at less than 5%. It includes water for the cooling of thermoelectric and nuclear power plants,
but it does not include hydropower.
